fg_segments: FlashGames247.com Privacy Statement Emails Flashgames247.com states email subscribers to our newsletters and game clubs will never have their email addresses given away, sold, or will be spammed in any way.
All subscribers always have an option to unsubscribe at any time.
This is done to protect all email addresses from being mistakenly or fraudulently added to our list by 3rd parties.
Site Visitors FlashGames247.com, our Web server automatically recognizes only the consumer's domain name and IP address, but not the e-mail address (where possible).
Email addresses are collected if visitors double opt-in to our Free Game Alert Service.
Email addresses are then only used by FlashGames247.com and not sold, rented, given, or shown to any other company for any use whatsoever.

Cookies If you do not want to receive e-mail's from FlashGames247.com in the future, please let us know by sending us a e-mail at the address below or if you are a subscriber to our Free Game Alert Service, you may follow the directions on the bottom of any of our Alerts and unsubscribe.
FlashGames247.com contains links to other sites. FlashGames247 is not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of such web sites.
If you are the original creator of material posted on this website and want it removed, please contact
Admin AT FlashGames247.com. If you feel that this site is not following its stated information policy, you may contact our Ethical Business Practices team.
We can be reached via e-mail at admin (at) FlashGames247.com

raw_html:
FlashGames247.com Privacy Statement
Emails
Flashgames247.com states email subscribers to our
                 newsletters and game clubs will never have their email addresses given away, sold, or will be spammed
                 in any way. All subscribers always have an option to unsubscribe at any time. This is done to protect
                 all email addresses from being mistakenly or fraudulently added to our list by 3rd parties.
Site Visitors
FlashGames247.com, our Web server automatically recognizes
                 only the consumer's domain name and IP address, but not the e-mail address (where possible).
Email addresses are collected if visitors double opt-in to our Free Game Alert Service. Email addresses
                 are then only used by FlashGames247.com and not sold, rented, given,
                 or shown to any other company for any use whatsoever.
Cookies
If you do not want to receive e-mail's from FlashGames247.com
                 in the future, please let us know by sending us a e-mail at the address below or if you are a subscriber
                 to our Free Game Alert Service, you may follow the directions on the bottom of any of our Alerts and
                 unsubscribe.
FlashGames247.com contains links to other sites. FlashGames247
                 is not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of such web sites. If you are the original
                 creator of material posted on this website and want it removed, please contact Admin AT FlashGames247.com.
If you feel that this site is not following its stated information policy, you may contact our Ethical
                 Business Practices team.
We can be reached via e-mail at admin (at) FlashGames247.com
